direction.raw_text: Aw, gee whiz.

direction.raw_text: Gee! That'd be swell! Elaine moves on to the two Black Dudes.

direction.raw_text: Striker and Elaine are running. She falls down at the water's edge, exhausted. Striker drops to his knees and they embrace passionately. A huge wave washes over them covering them completely. When the wave recedes, they're still locked in the same embrace. They are covered with seaweed. Fish are flopping around in the sand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Ted, I never knew I could be so happy. These past few months have been wonderful. Tomorrow why don't we drive up the coast to that little seafood place and... Striker frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My orders came through. My squadron ships out tomorrow. I'll be leading a very important mission.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Ted, please be careful. I worry about you so much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you, Elaine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you. They embrace. Another huge wave washes in and covers them completely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elaine comes back to reality.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In level flight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (v.o.) Flight two-zero-niner, this is Denver Flight Control. You're approaching some rough weather. Please climb to forty-two thousand feet.

direction.raw_text: Roger, Denver. There is a KNOCK on the cockpit door. Elaine and Joey enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have a visitor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Captain Oveur. Mister Murdock and Mister Johnson. This is Joey Hammen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on up here. You can see better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joey, here's something we give our special visitors. Would you like to have it? He gives Joey a small toy airplane and puts his arm around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you. Thanks a lot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you ever been in a cockpit before?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, sir. I've never been up in a plane before.

direction.raw_text: No, why don't you take care ot it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd better get back now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, if you don't get in the way. Elaine exits. Murdock picks up phone.

direction.raw_text: Flight two-zero-niner to Denver radio. Climbing to cruise at forty-two thousand. Will report again over Lincoln. Over and out. Joey has been paying very close attention to Murdock, and suddenly recognizes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute. I know you. You're Kareem Abdul Jabbar. You play basketball for the Los Angeles Lakers!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, son, but you must have me confused with someone else. My name is Roger Murdock. I'm the co-pilot. He turns to Basta.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, Victor, why don't you get the coordinates on the altitude vector and find out the ratio of direct velocity over engine speed? Victor is puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are Kareem. I've seen you play. My Dad's got season tickets!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you should go back to your seat now, Joey. Right, Clarence?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he's not bothering anyone. Let him stay up here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. But just remember, my name is Roger Murdock. He points to his nametag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm an airline pilot. (to Oveur) Ah, Clarence, according to my calculations, with this tailwind we ought to be able to make up an additional fifteen minutes over the Rockies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you're the greatest. But my Dad says you don't work hard enough on defense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Denver Control, this is Flight two-zero- niner intersecting Victor Airway seven- niner-niner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and that lots of times you don't even run down court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are turning left to a heading of zero- niner-niner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and that you don't really try, except during the playoffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hell I don't! I'm out there busting my buns every night. Murdock realizes he has given himself away. He quickly looks to see if Oveur is listening. Oveur is busy checking instruments. Murdock grabs Joey by the collar and whispers angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, kid, I've been hearing that crap ever since I was at UCLA. Tell your old man to drag Unseld and Lanier up and down the court for forty-eight minutes. (into mike) Ah...Denver Control, this is Flight two- zero-niner continuing on a heading two- niner-niner...niner, ah...niner...niner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elaine is seated next to Striker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elaine, just hear me out. I know things haven't been right for a long time. But it will be different...like it was in the beginning. Remember?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I remember everything. All I have are memories. Soft MUSIC begins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mostly I remember...the nights when we were together. I remember how you used to hold me...and how I used to sit on your face and wriggle...and then afterwards how we'd watch until the sun came up. When it did, it was almost like...like each new day was created...only for us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's the way I've always wanted it to be, Elaine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it won't be. Not as long as you insist on living in the past! Elaine leaves, teary-eyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fighter plane diving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're too low, Ted! You're too low! Fighter plane CRASHES.

direction.raw_text: Sign in front reads: U.S. ARMY PSYCHIATRIC HOSPITAL PENTATHOL AVAILABLE Master Charge, Visa, Carte Blanche

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got a telegram from headquarters today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Headquarters!? What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a big building where the generals meet. But that's not important right now. They've cleared you of any blame for what happened on that raid. Isn't that good news?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A surreal image of a soldier contorted like a pretzel clutching a machine gun in one hand and a crying infant in the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAY STRIKER Is it? Because of my mistake six men didn't return from that raid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seven. Lieutenant Zipp died this morning. Ted, Doctor Sandler says you'll be out in a week. Isn't that wonderful? In the b.g., a doctor in a white lab coat is attending a patient. When he turns around WE SEE he is wearing an STP insignia on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish I could say the same for George Zipp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be patient, Ted. No one expects you to get over this immediately. Striker is despondent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Striker!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about a break? I'm getting tired!

direction.raw_text: All right. Take five. McCobb untangles himself and walks off.

direction.raw_text: Could I borrow your guitar? I thought I might be able to cheer her up.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'd love to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, this is one of my favorites. Randy is sitting on the edge of the gurney as she strums three opening chords.

direction.raw_text: 'I've traveled the banks of the River Jordan, to find where it flows to the sea.' Stewardesses and passengers notice the singer and peer around corners and over seat backs. A man's head peers upside down from the TOP OF THE FRAME.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: looked in the eyes of the cold and the hungry and saw that I was looking at me.' As singing continues, Shirley and Jack look at each other with saccherine smiles, the Hammens do the same, then the Krishnas, then the Black Dudes. Finally, everyone is smiling sweetly at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Murdock and Oveur smile sweetly at each other...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (singing and playing the guitar) 'And I wanted to know if life had a purpose, and what it all means in the end. In the silence I listened to the voices inside me, and they told me again and again.' Tempo Jumps to rock pace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'There is only one river. There is only one sea.' Randy, in her growing enthusiasm, swings her guitar, knocking the I.V. connection tube from Lisa's arm. The I.V. squirts, and Lisa turns pale and hollowcheeked. No one else notices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'And it flows through you, and it flows through me. There is only one people, we are one and the same.' Lisa manages to reconnect her I.V.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'We are all one spirit, one name. We are the Father, we are the son.' Randy again knocks I.V. from Lisa's arm with guitar as the passengers start to get into the music.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'In the Dawn of Creation. We are one.' Mrs. Davis rushes to reconnect Lisa's I.V. Lisa doesn't react. Mrs. Davis pounds Lisa's chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'We are only one people, we are one and the same.' As Lisa revives, Randy swings her guitar and clonks Mrs. Davis on the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'We are all one spirit on Earth, one name.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & PASSENGERS (v.o.) 'We are the Father, we are the son, and in the Dawn of Creation we are one.'

direction.raw_text: Elaine enters with dinners.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, we've been waiting for you. A little bit late tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who wants to be first?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ahead, Clarence, I got it. Oveur removes his headset, Elaine puts tray down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How's the weather?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so good. We've got some heavy stuff ahead of us. It might get rough again unless we can climb on top. But our airspeed is holding steady at six hundred ten knots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's great. By the way, Joey Hammen asked me if you would autograph this basketball. Murdock autographs it reluctantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: dressed in World War II uniform, is now seated next to Striker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After the war, I just wanted to get as far away from things as possible. So Elaine and I joined the Peace Corps. We were assigned to an isolated tribe, the Molombos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Striker and Elaine are being escorted to the chief's hut by two GUARDS. We hear Jungle Animal SOUNDS. The chief is standing in front of his hut surrounded by several TRIBESMEN who are making the jungle animal sounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They had never seen Americans before. When Striker and Elaine arrive, the CHIEF holds up his hands and the sounds stop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At first, they didn't know what to think of us; but soon we gained their trust. The Chief extends his right hand for conventional handshake. Striker shows him power grip. When the Chief is pleased, Striker gives him five. The Chief pauses then decks Striker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It really was a challenge during the year introducing them to our Western culture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elaine is having a Supperware party for native women.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Also, Supperware products are ideal for storing leftovers to help stretch your food dollar. This two quart "Seals-M-Rite" container with a special "Close-M-Tite" lid keeps hotdog buns fresh for days and prevents sugared cereals from sticking. She scoops a ladle of corn mush from a carved wooden bowl into a Supperware container.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Meat and dairy products are protected against unwanted refrigerator odors when sealed in this non-slip pastel colored "Freez-o-leer". When she burps the lid, the Supperware makes a human burp
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Striker nailing crude basketball rim and net to tree.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You must understand that these people had been completely isolated from civilization. Striker demonstrates a two-handed set shot to natives. He misses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one had ever outlined a physical fitness program for them and they had no athletic equipment. Native examines basketball for first time. After two slow dribbles, he gracefully feints lefts, then, dribbling through his legs, sinks a two-hand, over-the-head, reverse dunk shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We also emphasized nutrition and taught them to watch their diets. Another native hits a long jump shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The exercise improved their physical fitness and condition. One shot after another swishes through the basketball rim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My working with them seemed to reinforce our objectives of group cooperation and controlled-competitive activity. Striker approaches Elaine who is standing on the sideline. As they talk, the natives are passing the ball around and shooting baskets Harlem Globetrotter fashion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think they're getting the hang of it! When we re-enlist I'll teach them baseball!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ted, I don't want to stay here. It's time for us to go back home -- to the plans we made before the war.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lot of people made plans before the war. Like George Zipp. Elaine walks away, dejectedly. CAMERA STAYS with Striker as he pours Gator-Ade into a glass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess it was at that moment that I first realized Elaine had doubts about our relationship. And that as much as anything else led to my drinking problem. Striker has a problem drinking. He raises his glass of Gator-Ade, then suddenly pours it on his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We did come back to the States. I tried a number of jobs...Well, I could go on for hours, but I'd probably start to bore you. The Japanese General is kneeling on the seat committing Hari Kari.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, I really couldn't blame Elaine. She wanted a career. I was offered a job at Boeing but I couldn't bring myself to take it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The businessman waiting in Striker's cab checks his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and lightning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shirley is ill and holding her stomach in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I can't stand it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is it? Elaine approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My, stomach. I haven't felt this awful since we saw that Lina Wertmuller film.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see if I can find some Dramamine. Elaine exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Elaine is on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain, one of the women passengers is very sick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joey enters to retrieve basketball. Murdock is wearing goggles. OVEUR Airsick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think so, but I've never seen it so acute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find out if there's a doctor on board, as quietly as you can. Oveur hangs up phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Joey, have you ever been in a Turkish prison?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HAMMEN (nauseous) Oooh, I shouldn't have had that second cup of coffee. He grabs for motion sickness bag. CAMERA ZOOMS to CLOSEUP of Mrs. Hammen.

direction.raw_text: Jim never vomits at home.

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry I had to wake you. I'm just looking for a doctor. There's nothing to worry about. Middle-aged lady, MRS. YAFFE, having overheard this conversation, beckons to Elaine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stewardess, I think the man next to me is a doctor. The MAN next to her is wearing a surgical cap with mask. Hanging around his neck is a stethoscope. He's sleeping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir. Excuse me, sir. I'm sorry to have to wake you. Are you a doctor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have some passengers who are very sick. Could you come and take a look at them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Yes, of course. Rumack picks up bag and exits with Elaine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rumack and Elaine enter. Rumack stoops over to Shirley, and surgical instrument is slapped into his hand from o.s. He pokes her stomach with his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pain there? She winces and nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May I see your tongue, please? She sticks her tongue out. Rumack pulls on it until it is obviously too long. He continues to pull, and the tongue becomes multi-colored magician's scarves. Then he pulls out a bouquet of flowers followed by a white dove.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll be back in a minute. Rumack takes Elaine aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd better tell the Captain. We've got to land as soon as we can. This woman has to be gotten to a hospital.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A hospital? What is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a big building with patients. But that's not important right now. Tell the Captain I must speak to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certainly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . COCKPIT - NIGHT OVEUR (into mike) Thank you, Omaha. Two-zero-niner out. (to Basta) Victor, we're running into a heavy storm, can you... Oveur turns to see Basta slumped over the console. Dramatic MUSIC.

direction.raw_text: Victor! Roger, take over! Oveur lifts Basta onto ground.

direction.raw_text: No, I mean we can't land for another two hours. Fog has closed down everything this side of the mountains. We've got to go through to Chicago! Suddenly, the plane rocks violently. Rumack and Oveur lose balance.

direction.raw_text: What is it, Doctor? What's happening?

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure. I haven't seen anything like this since the Lina Wertmuller Film Festival. Rumack and Elaine are now standing face-to-face. Oveur, in the f.g., is at controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was it we had for dinner tonight?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, we had a choice. Steak or fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, yes, I remember. I had lasagna. He points to Johnson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did he have?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He had fish. Randy enters cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have two more sick people, and the rest of the passengers are worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take care of the passengers. Elaine, find out what the two sick people had for dinner. (into P.A.) This is Captain Oveur speaking.

direction.raw_text: Striker, you're going to have to work fast. After this message, do not acknowledge any transmission unless you want to ask a question. Do you understand? Striker, Striker, do you read me?

direction.raw_text: Watch your altitude, Striker. It's too erratic. You can't come straight in. You've got enough fuel left for two hours flying. You've got to stay up there 'til we get a break in the weather.

direction.raw_text: I'll take it, Elaine. (into mike) Listen, Kramer, I'm coming in. Do you hear me? I'm coming in right now! We have people up here who will die in less than an hour, never mind two. I may bend your precious airplane, but I'll get it down! Now get on with the landing check. I'm putting the gear down now. As he activates landing gear, Randy enters.

direction.raw_text: . Suddenly the ENGINES REV UP. Astonished, they look up to the cockpit.
